item.title: Attending the 2nd Open Source Tech Conference
item.description: On November 22, 2025, I attended the 2nd Open Source Technology Academic Conference held at the Beijing E-Town International Convention & Exhibition Center. It was a privilege to witness the official inauguration of the CAST Open Source Innovation Committee. The event brought together experts and developers to discuss the future of the open-source ecosystem, and I gained valuable insights into the latest community developments and industrial applications. The Unveiling Ceremony of the CAST Open Source Innovation Committee Exploring the Open Source Community Exhibition and Booths
